00029 #ifndef _PMONLYADJUST_H_
00030 #define _PMONLYADJUST_H_
00031 
00032 //
00033 #include "chipstream/PmAdjuster.h"
00034 //
00035 #include "util/Convert.h"
00036 //
00037 
00038 /// String describing pm only adjust algorithm/module
00039 #define PMONLYSTR "pm-only"
00040 
00041 /**
00042  *  Pm adjustment class that does no modification.
00043  * 
00044  */
00045 class PmOnlyAdjust : public PmAdjuster {
00046 
00047 public:
00048 
00049   /** 
00050    * @brief Constructor.
00051    */
00052   PmOnlyAdjust() {
00053     setupSelfDoc(*this);
00054     m_Type = getDocName();
00055   }
00056 
00057   /** 
00058    * @brief Function to determine how much to adjust a perfect match intensity.
00059    * @param probeIx - Index of probe in cel file data.
00060    * @param chipIx - Microarray or chip index.
00061    * @param iMart - IntensityMart which holds raw data.
00062    * @param iTrans - Vector of transformations that should be performed on raw data.
00063    * @param pmIintensity - Intensity of perfect match probe to be adjusted, may
00064    * be modified from original value depending on adjuster
00065    * @param bgrdAdjust - Background adjustment, if any, recommended (i.e. MM intensity)
00066    */
00067   void pmAdjustment(int probeIx, int chipIx, 
00068                     const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00069                     float &pmIntensity, float &bgrdAdjust) {
00070     bgrdAdjust = 0;
00071   }
00072 
00073   /** 
00074    * Fill in the information for Self documentation.
00075    * @param doc - Self documenter to be filled in.
00076    */
00077   static void setupSelfDoc(SelfDoc &doc) {
00078     doc.setDocName(PMONLYSTR);
00079     doc.setDocDescription("No adjustment. Just uses unmodified PM intensity values.");
00080     // No parameters...
00081   }
00082 
00083   /** 
00084    * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00085    * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00086    * @return SelfDoc
00087    */
00088   static SelfDoc explainSelf() { 
00089     SelfDoc doc;
00090     setupSelfDoc(doc);
00091     return doc;
00092   }
00093 
00094   /** 
00095    * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00096    * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00097    * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00098    * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00099    * 
00100    * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00101    * 
00102    * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00103    */
00104   static SelfCreate *newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string> &param) {
00105     if(param.size() != 0) { Err::errAbort(ToStr("No parameters for ") + ToStr(PMONLYSTR)); }
00106     return new PmOnlyAdjust();
00107   }
00108 
00109   /**
00110    * Custom configuration for this PmAdjuster
00111    */
00112   virtual void setParameters(PsBoard &board) {
00113     // deliberate no-op here to avoid calling parent classes version
00114   }
00115 
00116 };
